arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach’s Tobias Sippel on surprise Bundesliga comeback: “It’s insane!”
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach #3 keeper Tobias Sippel found himself highly surprised to be thrust back into action on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Jess Thorup: “I had to raise my voice a bit.”
arts.sum: Gladbach’s coach discussed his side’s lack of determination after their home defeat to Augsburg. Meanwhile, his opponent shared his successful half-time tactic.

arts.ttl: Alexis Claude-Maurice hits second-half hat-trick as Augsburg sink 10-man Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Augsburg bided their time before putting Borussia Mönchengladbach to the sword, with a superb second-half showing from the visitors leaving the Foals to rue goalkeeper Jonas Omlin's early red card. Augsburg players celebrate as Claude-Maurice completes his hat-trick.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Alonso writes history, wins for Mainz and Augsburg, Hecking draw in Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen are back to winning ways after two goalless draws. Meanwhile, Mainz secure back-to-back wins. Wolfsburg avoid defeat with a late goal against Bochum.

arts.ttl: Augsburg Trolls Bayern Munich Over Kit Similarities
arts.sum: In a playful social media jab, FC Augsburg has poked fun at Bayern Munich's newly released 125th anniversary jersey, claiming the German champions have taken inspiration from its bordeaux-colored away kit released around a half year earlier.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Augsburg preview: European credentials put to the test
arts.sum: Champions League hopefuls Borussia Mönchengladbach will welcome Augsburg to Borussia Park on Saturday for their 23rd Bundesliga fixture of the 2024-25 season.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Official | Augsburg captain Jeffrey Gouweleeuw signs contract extension
arts.sum: FC Augsburg confirmed a contract extension for captain Jeffery Gouweleeuw on Thursday.
Jeffrey Gouweleeuw is staying at Augsburg beyond the summer.
